title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 472.2 - Maximum gross weight of trucks
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 472.2 - Maximum gross weight of trucks

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 501, subd. 4

The maximum gross weight of a truck is the unloaded
weight of the truck plus the maximum load to be carried by it on New York
public highways, exclusive of the weight of the driver and his helper. Example: If the unloaded weight of a truck is 5,500 pounds, and
the maximum load to be carried by it in New York is 14,000 pounds, its maximum
gross weight is 19,500 pounds. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
472.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
